title: cafter
author: cafter
content: Netflix account for $10 with full 1 month subscription plan HD

comments.author: hilariousandco
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 07, 2023, 06:28:23 AMNetflix account for $10 with full 1 month subscription plan HDNo offence but doesn't it only cost $20 a month anyway for the highest plan? People are selling accounts on here for mere dollars do I don't think you'll get much interest here.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: hilariousandco on April 07, 2023, 10:04:38 AMQuote from: cafter on April 07, 2023, 06:28:23 AMNetflix account for $10 with full 1 month subscription plan HDNo offence but doesn't it only cost $20 a month anyway for the highest plan? People are selling accounts on here for mere dollars do I don't think you'll get much interest here. let see anyone wants or not,

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: hilariousandco on April 07, 2023, 10:04:38 AMNo offence but doesn't it only cost $20 a month anyway for the highest plan? People are selling accounts on here for mere dollars do I don't think you'll get much interest here. The price of course depends from country to country, and in my case the Premium UHD package costs 9.99 EUR per month, while the Basic package costs 4.99 EUR. If you believe the data on this link, in some countries the Premium UHD package costs as much as $27, while there is also a country where it costs less than $4.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on April 07, 2023, 03:03:15 PMQuote from: hilariousandco on April 07, 2023, 10:04:38 AMNo offence but doesn't it only cost $20 a month anyway for the highest plan? People are selling accounts on here for mere dollars do I don't think you'll get much interest here. The price of course depends from country to country, and in my case the Premium UHD package costs 9.99 EUR per month, while the Basic package costs 4.99 EUR. If you believe the data on this link, in some countries the Premium UHD package costs as much as $27, while there is also a country where it costs less than $4.my account is from india, and price is higher then subscription price.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 07, 2023, 05:46:46 PMmy account is from india, and price is higher then subscription price. If the information on the link I posted is correct, Premium HD in India costs $6.07 per month, but as @hilariousandco already mentioned, you have at least a dozen members who sell N accounts for a much lower price - although I should be honest and say that most of them are shared accounts, even possibly hacked because you are not allowed to change anything.However, considering the changes that have already affected some countries, in the future each account will be locked to a specific location and device, so "sharing" of this type will no longer be possible.
